title: League crashes every time i start it up
body: so i uninstalled league of legends before and installed it again and now i have to right click on the league icon and run a administrator and it crashes and i have to keep doing it. when before i would click the league icon 2 times and i it would bring me to the sign in please help thank you

replies.body: Do you have Discord Overlay disabled.  If so, disable it and let me know if that helps.  Otherwise, get back at me with some more info like the error message and what you're seeing.
https://imgur.com/atTU7UO i turned it off still

Previous settings with the overlay might still be impacting your client.  See if running As Administrator works.  If it does, you may need to restart your PC or uninstall Discord if you have the client.
yes i have to run as administrator every time when i used to have a shortcut that would just bring me to the login screen

Thanks for the info here.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case so we can find some more options for you.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to get some logs and attach it to your ticket, we'll see you there!
